T02TD1479E:122a-1: shr'i tsakra samba ra mandala mam ga la g'a th'a ;
T02TD1479E:122a-3: dpal 'khor lo sngom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa /
T02TD1479E:122a-4: dpal 'khor lo bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1479E:122a-5: bkra shis gang zhig chos kyi dbyings las nges byung zhing //
T02TD1479E:122a-6: he ru ka dpal 'jigs byed rgyal po 'bar pa'i sku //
T02TD1479E:122a-7: shes rab phag mo'i padmor rdo rje rol mdzad pa'i //
T02TD1479E:122a-8: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig phyogs kyi padmo'i 'dab ma la //
T02TD1479E:122a-9: rigs kyi yum bzhi dpa' bo'i phyogs bzhi'i zhal la gzigs //
T02TD1479E:122a-10: padmo mu khyud gri gug phreng bas rnam par mdzes//
T02TD1479E:122b-0: @122b bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig mtshams kyi padmo'i 'dab ma la //
T02TD1479E:122b-1: byang chub sems dang tsandan dri chen gur kum chus //
T02TD1479E:122b-2: gang ba'i snod bzhi dpa' bo'i zhal la reg par mdzod //
T02TD1479E:122b-3: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog ;
T02TD1479E:122b-4: / bkra shis gang zhig nam mkha'i gnas nas legs spyod pa'i //
T02TD1479E:122b-5: 'khor lo sngon po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud rdo rje phreng //
T02TD1479E:122b-6: gnas la sogs par dpa' bo dpa' mo gnyis med rol //
T02TD1479E:122b-7: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig sa stengs gnas nas legs spyod pa'i //
T02TD1479E:122b-8: 'khor lo dmar po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud padmo'i phreng //
T02TD1479E:122b-9: zhing la sogs par dpa' bo dpa' mo gnyis med rol //
T02TD1479E:122b-10: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig sa 'og gnas nas legs spyod pa'i //
T02TD1479E:122b-11: 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad mu khyud 'khor lo'i phreng //
T02TD1479E:122b-12: 'du la sogs par dpa' bo dpa' mo gnyis med rol //
T02TD1479E:122b-13: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi mtshams rnams su //
T02TD1479E:122b-14: khva gdong la sogs ma mo yid 'phrog gzugs gnyis ldan //
T02TD1479E:122b-15: thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don mdzad gdug pa kun 'dul ba'i //
T02TD1479E:122b-16: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi rnams dang //
T02TD1479E:122b-17: yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang dang dbang po stobs //
T02TD1479E:122b-18: byang chub phyogs chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs rdzogs pa'i //
T02TD1479E:122b-19: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig rin chen pha gus mdzes pa'i gzhal yas khang //
T02TD1479E:122b-20: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas ni rab tu brgyan gyur pa'i //
T02TD1479E:122b-21: mu tig phreng ba gser gyi dril bu rnga yab legs dpyangs 'phyar //
T02TD1479E:122b-22: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig rta babs padma chos kyi 'khor lo gdugs //
T02TD1479E:122b-23: mdzes pa'i ri dags dang bcas ba dan bcu drug legs 'phyar zhing //
T02TD1479E:123a-0: rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bu dag @123a * //
T02TD1479E:123a-2: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig yongs su bskor ba'i dur khrod brgyad rnams su //
T02TD1479E:123a-3: phyogs skyong shing chen mchod rten brgyad ni gnas pa la //
T02TD1479E:123a-4: gdong brnyan ldan zhing zhing skyong brgyad ni kun nas gnas gyur pa //
T02TD1479E:123a-5: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig ye shes me brgyad rab tu 'bar gyur pa //
T02TD1479E:123a-6: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin sprin chen brgyad ni 'dus gyur pa //
T02TD1479E:123a-7: dga' po la sogs klu chen brgyad rnams kun nas gnas gyur pa //
T02TD1479E:123a-8: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig thugs rje'i rang bzhin chu chen brgyad 'bab cing //
T02TD1479E:123a-9: dpa' bo dang ni rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyis gang //
T02TD1479E:123a-10: 'dre dang sha za gnod sbyin 'byung po nye bar bsten pa yi //
T02TD1479E:123a-11: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi bkra shis shog / bkra shis gang zhig rdo rje'i sa gzhir ba gur //
T02TD1479E:123a-12: rdo rje bla bres kun nas bres shing mda' yi ra bar ldan //
T02TD1479E:123a-13: ye shes me ri phreng bas kun nas yongs bskor ba'i //
T02TD1479E:123a-14: bden pa des kyang bde mchog la gnas rnams kyi bkra shis shog / dpal 'khor lo bde mchog gi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa /
T02TD1479E:123a-15: kha che'i yul du byung zhing dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1479E:123a-17: // / bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o //
T02TD1479E:123a-18: 'di'i zhu dag dang srung ba'i 'khor lo'i kha skong rnams 'phags pas bgyis lags so//
